animals.name: Goat
animals.description: A hardy domesticated ruminant mammal that has backward-curving horns and (in the male) a beard. It is kept for its milk and meat, and noted for its lively behaviour.

animals.name: Sheep
animals.description: Sheep or domestic sheep are a domesticated, ruminant mammal typically kept as livestock. Although the term sheep can apply to other species in the genus Ovis, in everyday

animals.name: Camel
animals.description: A camel is an even-toed ungulate in the genus Camelus that bears distinctive fatty deposits known as 'humps' on its back. Camels have long been domesticated and, as livestock

animals.name: Cow
animals.description: Cattle are large, domesticated, bovid ungulates. They are prominent modern members of the subfamily Bovinae and the most widespread species of the genus Bos. Mature female cattle.

animals.name: Horse
animals.description: The horse is a domesticated, one-toed, hoofed mammal. It belongs to the taxonomic family Equidae and is one of two extant subspecies of Equus ferus. The horse has evolved

animals.name: Zebra
animals.description: Zebras are African equines with distinctive black-and-white striped coats. There are three living species: Gr√©vy's zebra, the plains zebra, and the mountain zebra.
